numbered_ace_sentences: 1. I noticed that some countries have high poverty rates.
2. I noticed that in these countries some people think that the world is getting better.
3. I noticed that more young people think that the world is getting better.
4. I noticed that only a few older people think that the world is getting better.
5. I wonder why this is true.
6. Older people live longer than young people.
7. If a person lives longer, then the person experiences more events.
8. Some older people experienced worse things.
9. I am confused because only a few older people think that the world is getting better.
11. In my community there are many controversial topics.
12. In my community people cannot agree on some things.
13. If people cannot agree on things, then hate increases within the country.
15. Some older people think that life was better before.
16. The headline is: Countries with higher poverty rates believe that the world is getting better.
